Docs.summary: Gets or sets the secondary background color of a border skin frame.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This color is combined with the primary background color, which is set with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackColor%2A> property, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackHatchStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackGradientStyle%2A> properties are used.
